data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus - iOS 11.4.1, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 5
data.actual_result: Discord crashes after closing server settings.
data.expected_result: The link should be removed or replaced because there are no keybind settings for iOS.
data.short_description: Discord crashes when clicking on the priority speaker description link
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your server settings - Open roles - Click on any role - Select voice permission - Click on the link in the description of the priority speaker permission - Close the server settings
